43011056	They kept looking for Jesus , and as they stood in the temple courts they asked one another , ‘ What do you think ? Isn’t he coming to the festival at all ? ’
43011057	But the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that anyone who found out where Jesus was should report it so that they might arrest him .
43012001	Six days before the Passover , Jesus came to Bethany , where Lazarus lived , whom Jesus had raised from the dead .
43012002	Here a dinner was given in Jesus’ honour . Martha served , while Lazarus was among those reclining at the table with him .
43012003	Then Mary took about half a litre of pure nard , an expensive perfume ; she poured it on Jesus’ feet and wiped his feet with her hair . And the house was filled with the fragrance of the perfume .
43012004	But one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , who was later to betray him , objected ,
43012005	‘ Why wasn’t this perfume sold and the money given to the poor ? It was worth a year’s wages . ’
43012006	He did not say this because he cared about the poor but because he was a thief ; as keeper of the money bag , he used to help himself to what was put into it .
43012007	‘ Leave her alone , ’ Jesus replied . ‘ It was intended that she should save this perfume for the day of my burial .
43012008	You will always have the poor among you , but you will not always have me . ’
43012009	Meanwhile a large crowd of Jews found out that Jesus was there and came , not only because of him but also to see Lazarus , whom he had raised from the dead .
43012010	So the chief priests made plans to kill Lazarus as well ,
43012011	for on account of him many of the Jews were going over to Jesus and believing in him .
43012012	The next day the great crowd that had come for the festival heard that Jesus was on his way to Jerusalem .
43012013	They took palm branches and went out to meet him , shouting , ‘ Hosanna ! ’ ‘ Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’ ‘ Blessed is the king of Israel ! ’
43012015	‘ Do not be afraid , Daughter Zion ; see , your king is coming , seated on a donkey’s colt . ’
43012016	At first his disciples did not understand all this . Only after Jesus was glorified did they realise that these things had been written about him and that these things had been done to him .
43012017	Now the crowd that was with him when he called Lazarus from the tomb and raised him from the dead continued to spread the word .
43012018	Many people , because they had heard that he had performed this sign , went out to meet him .
43012019	So the Pharisees said to one another , ‘ See , this is getting us nowhere . Look how the whole world has gone after him ! ’
43012020	Now there were some Greeks among those who went up to worship at the festival .
43012021	They came to Philip , who was from Bethsaida in Galilee , with a request . ‘ Sir , ’ they said , ‘ we would like to see Jesus . ’
43012022	Philip went to tell Andrew ; Andrew and Philip in turn told Jesus .
43012023	Jesus replied , ‘ The hour has come for the Son of Man to be glorified .
43012024	Very truly I tell you , unless a grain of wheat falls to the ground and dies , it remains only a single seed . But if it dies , it produces many seeds .
43012025	Anyone who loves their life will lose it , while anyone who hates their life in this world will keep it for eternal life .
43012026	Whoever serves me must follow me ; and where I am , my servant also will be . My Father will honour the one who serves me .
43012027	‘ Now my soul is troubled , and what shall I say ? “ Father , save me from this hour ” ? No , it was for this very reason I came to this hour .
43012028	Father , glorify your name ! ’ Then a voice came from heaven , ‘ I have glorified it , and will glorify it again . ’
43012029	The crowd that was there and heard it said it had thundered ; others said an angel had spoken to him .
43012030	Jesus said , ‘ This voice was for your benefit , not mine .
43012031	Now is the time for judgment on this world ; now the prince of this world will be driven out .
43012032	And I , when I am lifted up from the earth , will draw all people to myself . ’
43012033	He said this to show the kind of death he was going to die .
43012034	The crowd spoke up , ‘ We have heard from the Law that the Messiah will remain for ever , so how can you say , “ The Son of Man must be lifted up ” ? Who is this “ Son of Man ” ? ’
43012035	Then Jesus told them , ‘ You are going to have the light just a little while longer . Walk while you have the light , before darkness overtakes you . Whoever walks in the dark does not know where they are going .
43012036	Believe in the light while you have the light , so that you may become children of light . ’ When he had finished speaking , Jesus left and hid himself from them .
43012037	Even after Jesus had performed so many signs in their presence , they still would not believe in him .
43012038	This was to fulfil the word of Isaiah the prophet : ‘ Lord , who has believed our message and to whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed ? ’
43012039	For this reason they could not believe , because , as Isaiah says elsewhere :
43012040	‘ He has blinded their eyes and hardened their hearts , so they can neither see with their eyes , nor understand with their hearts , nor turn – and I would heal them . ’
43012042	Yet at the same time many even among the leaders believed in him . But because of the Pharisees they would not openly acknowledge their faith for fear they would be put out of the synagogue ;
43012043	for they loved human praise more than praise from God .
43012044	Then Jesus cried out , ‘ Whoever believes in me does not believe in me only , but in the one who sent me .
43012045	The one who looks at me is seeing the one who sent me .
43012046	I have come into the world as a light , so that no one who believes in me should stay in darkness .
43012047	‘ If anyone hears my words but does not keep them , I do not judge that person . For I did not come to judge the world , but to save the world .
43012048	There is a judge for the one who rejects me and does not accept my words ; the very words I have spoken will condemn them at the last day .
43012049	For I did not speak on my own , but the Father who sent me commanded me to say all that I have spoken .
43012050	I know that his command leads to eternal life . So whatever I say is just what the Father has told me to say . ’
43013001	It was just before the Passover Festival . Jesus knew that the hour had come for him to leave this world and go to the Father . Having loved his own who were in the world , he loved them to the end .
43013002	The evening meal was in progress , and the devil had already prompted Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot , to betray Jesus .
43013003	Jesus knew that the Father had put all things under his power , and that he had come from God and was returning to God ;
43013004	so he got up from the meal , took off his outer clothing , and wrapped a towel round his waist .
43013005	After that , he poured water into a basin and began to wash his disciples’ feet , drying them with the towel that was wrapped round him .
43013006	He came to Simon Peter , who said to him , ‘ Lord , are you going to wash my feet ? ’
43013007	Jesus replied , ‘ You do not realise now what I am doing , but later you will understand . ’
43013008	‘ No , ’ said Peter , ‘ you shall never wash my feet . ’ Jesus answered , ‘ Unless I wash you , you have no part with me . ’
43013009	‘ Then , Lord , ’ Simon Peter replied , ‘ not just my feet but my hands and my head as well ! ’
43013010	Jesus answered , ‘ Those who have had a bath need only to wash their feet ; their whole body is clean . And you are clean , though not every one of you . ’
43013011	For he knew who was going to betray him , and that was why he said not every one was clean .
43013012	When he had finished washing their feet , he put on his clothes and returned to his place . ‘ Do you understand what I have done for you ? ’ he asked them .
43013013	‘ You call me “ Teacher ” and “ Lord ” , and rightly so , for that is what I am .
43013014	Now that I , your Lord and Teacher , have washed your feet , you also should wash one another’s feet .
43013015	I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you .
43013016	Very truly I tell you , no servant is greater than his master , nor is a messenger greater than the one who sent him .
43013017	Now that you know these things , you will be blessed if you do them .
43013018	‘ I am not referring to all of you ; I know those I have chosen . But this is to fulfil this passage of Scripture : “ He who shared my bread has turned against me . ”
43013019	‘ I am telling you now before it happens , so that when it does happen you will believe that I am who I am .
43013020	Very truly I tell you , whoever accepts anyone I send accepts me ; and whoever accepts me accepts the one who sent me . ’
43013021	After he had said this , Jesus was troubled in spirit and testified , ‘ Very truly I tell you , one of you is going to betray me . ’
43013022	His disciples stared at one another , at a loss to know which of them he meant .
43013023	One of them , the disciple whom Jesus loved , was reclining next to him .
43013024	Simon Peter motioned to this disciple and said , ‘ Ask him which one he means . ’
43013025	Leaning back against Jesus , he asked him , ‘ Lord , who is it ? ’
43013026	Jesus answered , ‘ It is the one to whom I will give this piece of bread when I have dipped it in the dish . ’ Then , dipping the piece of bread , he gave it to Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot .
43013027	As soon as Judas took the bread , Satan entered into him . So Jesus told him , ‘ What you are about to do , do quickly . ’
43013028	But no one at the meal understood why Jesus said this to him .
43013029	Since Judas had charge of the money , some thought Jesus was telling him to buy what was needed for the festival , or to give something to the poor .
43013030	As soon as Judas had taken the bread , he went out . And it was night .
43013031	When he was gone , Jesus said , ‘ Now the Son of Man is glorified and God is glorified in him .
43013032	If God is glorified in him , God will glorify the Son in himself , and will glorify him at once .
43013033	‘ My children , I will be with you only a little longer . You will look for me , and just as I told the Jews , so I tell you now : where I am going , you cannot come .
43013034	‘ A new command I give you : love one another . As I have loved you , so you must love one another .
43013035	By this everyone will know that you are my disciples , if you love one another . ’
43013036	Simon Peter asked him , ‘ Lord , where are you going ? ’ Jesus replied , ‘ Where I am going , you cannot follow now , but you will follow later . ’
43013037	Peter asked , ‘ Lord , why can’t I follow you now ? I will lay down my life for you . ’
43013038	Then Jesus answered , ‘ Will you really lay down your life for me ? Very truly I tell you , before the cock crows , you will disown me three times !
43014001	‘ Do not let your hearts be troubled . You believe in God ; believe also in me .
43014002	My Father’s house has many rooms ; if that were not so , would I have told you that I am going there to prepare a place for you ?
43014003	And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come back and take you to be with me that you also may be where I am .
43014004	You know the way to the place where I am going . ’
43014005	Thomas said to him , ‘ Lord , we don’t know where you are going , so how can we know the way ? ’
43014006	Jesus answered , ‘ I am the way and the truth and the life . No one comes to the Father except through me .
43014007	If you really know me , you will know my Father as well . From now on , you do know him and have seen him . ’
43014008	Philip said , ‘ Lord , show us the Father and that will be enough for us . ’
43014009	Jesus answered : ‘ Don’t you know me , Philip , even after I have been among you such a long time ? Anyone who has seen me has seen the Father . How can you say , “ Show us the Father ” ?
43014010	Don’t you believe that I am in the Father , and that the Father is in me ? The words I say to you I do not speak on my own authority . Rather , it is the Father , living in me , who is doing his work .
43014011	Believe me when I say that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ; or at least believe on the evidence of the works themselves .
43014012	Very truly I tell you , whoever believes in me will do the works I have been doing , and they will do even greater things than these , because I am going to the Father .
43014013	And I will do whatever you ask in my name , so that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
43014014	You may ask me for anything in my name , and I will do it .
43014015	‘ If you love me , keep my commands .
43014016	And I will ask the Father , and he will give you another advocate to help you and be with you for ever –
43014017	the Spirit of truth . The world cannot accept him , because it neither sees him nor knows him . But you know him , for he lives with you and will be in you .
43014018	I will not leave you as orphans ; I will come to you .
43014019	Before long , the world will not see me any more , but you will see me . Because I live , you also will live .
43014020	On that day you will realise that I am in my Father , and you are in me , and I am in you .
43014021	Whoever has my commands and keeps them is the one who loves me . The one who loves me will be loved by my Father , and I too will love them and show myself to them . ’
43014022	Then Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) said , ‘ But , Lord , why do you intend to show yourself to us and not to the world ? ’
43014023	Jesus replied , ‘ Anyone who loves me will obey my teaching . My Father will love them , and we will come to them and make our home with them .
43014024	Anyone who does not love me will not obey my teaching . These words you hear are not my own ; they belong to the Father who sent me .
43014025	‘ All this I have spoken while still with you .
43014026	But the Advocate , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will teach you all things and will remind you of everything I have said to you .
43014027	Peace I leave with you ; my peace I give you . I do not give to you as the world gives . Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid .
43014028	‘ You heard me say , “ I am going away and I am coming back to you . ” If you loved me , you would be glad that I am going to the Father , for the Father is greater than I .
43014029	I have told you now before it happens , so that when it does happen you will believe .
43014030	I will not say much more to you , for the prince of this world is coming . He has no hold over me ,
43014031	but he comes so that the world may learn that I love the Father and do exactly what my Father has commanded me . ‘ Come now ; let us leave .
43015001	‘ I am the true vine , and my Father is the gardener .
43015002	He cuts off every branch in me that bears no fruit , while every branch that does bear fruit he prunes so that it will be even more fruitful .
43015003	You are already clean because of the word I have spoken to you .
43015004	Remain in me , as I also remain in you . No branch can bear fruit by itself ; it must remain in the vine . Neither can you bear fruit unless you remain in me .
43015005	‘ I am the vine ; you are the branches . If you remain in me and I in you , you will bear much fruit ; apart from me you can do nothing .
43015006	If you do not remain in me , you are like a branch that is thrown away and withers ; such branches are picked up , thrown into the fire and burned .
43015007	If you remain in me and my words remain in you , ask whatever you wish , and it will be done for you .
43015008	This is to my Father’s glory , that you bear much fruit , showing yourselves to be my disciples .
43015009	‘ As the Father has loved me , so have I loved you . Now remain in my love .
43015010	If you keep my commands , you will remain in my love , just as I have kept my Father’s commands and remain in his love .
43015011	I have told you this so that my joy may be in you and that your joy may be complete .
43015012	My command is this : love each other as I have loved you .
43015013	Greater love has no one than this : to lay down one’s life for one’s friends .
43015014	You are my friends if you do what I command .
43015015	I no longer call you servants , because a servant does not know his master’s business . Instead , I have called you friends , for everything that I learned from my Father I have made known to you .
43015016	You did not choose me , but I chose you and appointed you so that you might go and bear fruit – fruit that will last – and so that whatever you ask in my name the Father will give you .
43015017	This is my command : love each other .
43015018	‘ If the world hates you , keep in mind that it hated me first .
43015019	If you belonged to the world , it would love you as its own . As it is , you do not belong to the world , but I have chosen you out of the world . That is why the world hates you .
43015020	Remember what I told you : “ A servant is not greater than his master . ” If they persecuted me , they will persecute you also . If they obeyed my teaching , they will obey yours also .
43015021	They will treat you this way because of my name , for they do not know the one who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and spoken to them , they would not be guilty of sin ; but now they have no excuse for their sin .
43015023	Whoever hates me hates my Father as well .
43015024	If I had not done among them the works no one else did , they would not be guilty of sin . As it is , they have seen , and yet they have hated both me and my Father .
43015025	But this is to fulfil what is written in their Law : “ They hated me without reason . ”
43015026	‘ When the Advocate comes , whom I will send to you from the Father – the Spirit of truth who goes out from the Father – he will testify about me .
43015027	And you also must testify , for you have been with me from the beginning .
43016001	‘ All this I have told you so that you will not fall away .
43016002	They will put you out of the synagogue ; in fact , the time is coming when anyone who kills you will think they are offering a service to God .
43016003	They will do such things because they have not known the Father or me .
43016004	I have told you this , so that when their time comes you will remember that I warned you about them . I did not tell you this from the beginning because I was with you ,
43016005	but now I am going to him who sent me . None of you asks me , “ Where are you going ? ”
43016006	Rather , you are filled with grief because I have said these things .
43016007	But very truly I tell you , it is for your good that I am going away . Unless I go away , the Advocate will not come to you ; but if I go , I will send him to you .
43016008	When he comes , he will prove the world to be in the wrong about sin and righteousness and judgment :
43016009	about sin , because people do not believe in me ;
43016010	about righteousness , because I am going to the Father , where you can see me no longer ;
43016011	and about judgment , because the prince of this world now stands condemned .
43016012	‘ I have much more to say to you , more than you can now bear .
43016013	But when he , the Spirit of truth , comes , he will guide you into all the truth . He will not speak on his own ; he will speak only what he hears , and he will tell you what is yet to come .
43016014	He will glorify me because it is from me that he will receive what he will make known to you .
43016015	All that belongs to the Father is mine . That is why I said the Spirit will receive from me what he will make known to you . ’
43016016	Jesus went on to say , ‘ In a little while you will see me no more , and then after a little while you will see me . ’
43016017	At this , some of his disciples said to one another , ‘ What does he mean by saying , “ In a little while you will see me no more , and then after a little while you will see me , ” and “ Because I am going to the Father ” ? ’
43016018	They kept asking , ‘ What does he mean by “ a little while ” ? We don’t understand what he is saying . ’
43016019	Jesus saw that they wanted to ask him about this , so he said to them , ‘ Are you asking one another what I meant when I said , “ In a little while you will see me no more , and then after a little while you will see me ” ?
43016020	Very truly I tell you , you will weep and mourn while the world rejoices . You will grieve , but your grief will turn to joy .
43016021	A woman giving birth to a child has pain because her time has come ; but when her baby is born she forgets the anguish because of her joy that a child is born into the world .
43016022	So with you : now is your time of grief , but I will see you again and you will rejoice , and no one will take away your joy .
43016023	In that day you will no longer ask me anything . Very truly I tell you , my Father will give you whatever you ask in my name .
43016024	Until now you have not asked for anything in my name . Ask and you will receive , and your joy will be complete .
43016025	‘ Though I have been speaking figuratively , a time is coming when I will no longer use this kind of language but will tell you plainly about my Father .
43016026	In that day you will ask in my name . I am not saying that I will ask the Father on your behalf .
43016027	No , the Father himself loves you because you have loved me and have believed that I came from God .
43016028	I came from the Father and entered the world ; now I am leaving the world and going back to the Father . ’
43016029	Then Jesus’ disciples said , ‘ Now you are speaking clearly and without figures of speech .
43016030	Now we can see that you know all things and that you do not even need to have anyone ask you questions . This makes us believe that you came from God . ’
43016031	‘ Do you now believe ? ’ Jesus replied .
43016032	‘ A time is coming and in fact has come when you will be scattered , each to your own home . You will leave me all alone . Yet I am not alone , for my Father is with me .
43016033	‘ I have told you these things , so that in me you may have peace . In this world you will have trouble . But take heart ! I have overcome the world . ’
43017001	After Jesus said this , he looked towards heaven and prayed : ‘ Father , the hour has come . Glorify your Son , that your Son may glorify you .
43017002	For you granted him authority over all people that he might give eternal life to all those you have given him .
43017003	Now this is eternal life : that they know you , the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom you have sent .
43017004	I have brought you glory on earth by finishing the work you gave me to do .
43017005	And now , Father , glorify me in your presence with the glory I had with you before the world began .
43017006	‘ I have revealed you to those whom you gave me out of the world . They were yours ; you gave them to me and they have obeyed your word .
43017007	Now they know that everything you have given me comes from you .
43017008	For I gave them the words you gave me and they accepted them . They knew with certainty that I came from you , and they believed that you sent me .
43017009	I pray for them . I am not praying for the world , but for those you have given me , for they are yours .
43017010	All I have is yours , and all you have is mine . And glory has come to me through them .
43017011	I will remain in the world no longer , but they are still in the world , and I am coming to you . Holy Father , protect them by the power of your name , the name you gave me , so that they may be one as we are one .
43017012	While I was with them , I protected them and kept them safe by that name you gave me . None has been lost except the one doomed to destruction so that Scripture would be fulfilled .
43017013	‘ I am coming to you now , but I say these things while I am still in the world , so that they may have the full measure of my joy within them .
43017014	I have given them your word and the world has hated them , for they are not of the world any more than I am of the world .
43017015	My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one .
43017016	They are not of the world , even as I am not of it .
43017017	Sanctify them by the truth ; your word is truth .
43017018	As you sent me into the world , I have sent them into the world .
43017019	For them I sanctify myself , that they too may be truly sanctified .
43017020	‘ My prayer is not for them alone . I pray also for those who will believe in me through their message ,
43017021	that all of them may be one , Father , just as you are in me and I am in you . May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me .
43017022	I have given them the glory that you gave me , that they may be one as we are one –
43017023	I in them and you in me – so that they may be brought to complete unity . Then the world will know that you sent me and have loved them even as you have loved me .
43017024	‘ Father , I want those you have given me to be with me where I am , and to see my glory , the glory you have given me because you loved me before the creation of the world .
43017025	‘ Righteous Father , though the world does not know you , I know you , and they know that you have sent me .
43017026	I have made you known to them , and will continue to make you known in order that the love you have for me may be in them and that I myself may be in them . ’
43018001	When he had finished praying , Jesus left with his disciples and crossed the Kidron Valley . On the other side there was a garden , and he and his disciples went into it .
43018002	Now Judas , who betrayed him , knew the place , because Jesus had often met there with his disciples .
43018003	So Judas came to the garden , guiding a detachment of soldiers and some officials from the chief priests and the Pharisees . They were carrying torches , lanterns and weapons .
43018004	Jesus , knowing all that was going to happen to him , went out and asked them , ‘ Who is it you want ? ’
43018005	‘ Jesus of Nazareth , ’ they replied . ‘ I am he , ’ Jesus said . ( And Judas the traitor was standing there with them . )
43018006	When Jesus said , ‘ I am he , ’ they drew back and fell to the ground .
43018007	Again he asked them , ‘ Who is it you want ? ’ ‘ Jesus of Nazareth , ’ they said .
43018008	Jesus answered , ‘ I told you that I am he . If you are looking for me , then let these men go . ’
43018009	This happened so that the words he had spoken would be fulfilled : ‘ I have not lost one of those you gave me . ’
43018010	Then Simon Peter , who had a sword , drew it and struck the high priest’s servant , cutting off his right ear . ( The servant’s name was Malchus . )
43018011	Jesus commanded Peter , ‘ Put your sword away ! Shall I not drink the cup the Father has given me ? ’
43018012	Then the detachment of soldiers with its commander and the Jewish officials arrested Jesus . They bound him
43018013	and brought him first to Annas , who was the father-in-law of Caiaphas , the high priest that year .
43018014	Caiaphas was the one who had advised the Jewish leaders that it would be good if one man died for the people .
43018015	Simon Peter and another disciple were following Jesus . Because this disciple was known to the high priest , he went with Jesus into the high priest’s courtyard ,
43018016	but Peter had to wait outside at the door . The other disciple , who was known to the high priest , came back , spoke to the servant-girl on duty there and brought Peter in .
43018017	‘ You aren’t one of this man’s disciples too , are you ? ’ she asked Peter . He replied , ‘ I am not . ’
43018018	It was cold , and the servants and officials stood round a fire they had made to keep warm . Peter also was standing with them , warming himself .
43018019	Meanwhile , the high priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and his teaching .
43018020	‘ I have spoken openly to the world , ’ Jesus replied . ‘ I always taught in synagogues or at the temple , where all the Jews come together . I said nothing in secret .
43018021	Why question me ? Ask those who heard me . Surely they know what I said . ’
43018022	When Jesus said this , one of the officials near by slapped him in the face . ‘ Is this the way you answer the high priest ? ’ he demanded .
43018023	‘ If I said something wrong , ’ Jesus replied , ‘ testify as to what is wrong . But if I spoke the truth , why did you strike me ? ’
43018024	Then Annas sent him bound to Caiaphas the high priest .
43018025	Meanwhile , Simon Peter was still standing there warming himself . So they asked him , ‘ You aren’t one of his disciples too , are you ? ’ He denied it , saying , ‘ I am not . ’
43018026	One of the high priest’s servants , a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off , challenged him , ‘ Didn’t I see you with him in the garden ? ’
43018027	Again Peter denied it , and at that moment a cock began to crow .
43018028	Then the Jewish leaders took Jesus from Caiaphas to the palace of the Roman governor . By now it was early morning , and to avoid ceremonial uncleanness they did not enter the palace , because they wanted to be able to eat the Passover .
43018029	So Pilate came out to them and asked , ‘ What charges are you bringing against this man ? ’
43018030	‘ If he were not a criminal , ’ they replied , ‘ we would not have handed him over to you . ’
43018031	Pilate said , ‘ Take him yourselves and judge him by your own law . ’ ‘ But we have no right to execute anyone , ’ they objected .
43018032	This took place to fulfil what Jesus had said about the kind of death he was going to die .
43018033	Pilate then went back inside the palace , summoned Jesus and asked him , ‘ Are you the king of the Jews ? ’
43018034	‘ Is that your own idea , ’ Jesus asked , ‘ or did others talk to you about me ? ’
43018035	‘ Am I a Jew ? ’ Pilate replied . ‘ Your own people and chief priests handed you over to me . What is it you have done ? ’
43018036	Jesus said , ‘ My kingdom is not of this world . If it were , my servants would fight to prevent my arrest by the Jewish leaders . But now my kingdom is from another place . ’
43018037	‘ You are a king , then ! ’ said Pilate . Jesus answered , ‘ You say that I am a king . In fact , the reason I was born and came into the world is to testify to the truth . Everyone on the side of truth listens to me . ’
43018038	‘ What is truth ? ’ retorted Pilate . With this he went out again to the Jews gathered there and said , ‘ I find no basis for a charge against him .
43018039	But it is your custom for me to release to you one prisoner at the time of the Passover . Do you want me to release “ the king of the Jews ” ? ’
43018040	They shouted back , ‘ No , not him ! Give us Barabbas ! ’ Now Barabbas had taken part in an uprising .
43019001	Then Pilate took Jesus and had him flogged .
43019002	The soldiers twisted together a crown of thorns and put it on his head . They clothed him in a purple robe
43019003	and went up to him again and again , saying , ‘ Hail , king of the Jews ! ’ And they slapped him in the face .
43019004	Once more Pilate came out and said to the Jews gathered there , ‘ Look , I am bringing him out to you to let you know that I find no basis for a charge against him . ’
43019005	When Jesus came out wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe , Pilate said to them , ‘ Here is the man ! ’
43019006	As soon as the chief priests and their officials saw him , they shouted , ‘ Crucify ! Crucify ! ’ But Pilate answered , ‘ You take him and crucify him . As for me , I find no basis for a charge against him . ’
43019007	The Jewish leaders insisted , ‘ We have a law , and according to that law he must die , because he claimed to be the Son of God . ’
43019008	When Pilate heard this , he was even more afraid ,
43019009	and he went back inside the palace . ‘ Where do you come from ? ’ he asked Jesus , but Jesus gave him no answer .
43019010	‘ Do you refuse to speak to me ? ’ Pilate said . ‘ Don’t you realise I have power either to free you or to crucify you ? ’
43019011	Jesus answered , ‘ You would have no power over me if it were not given to you from above . Therefore the one who handed me over to you is guilty of a greater sin . ’
43019012	From then on , Pilate tried to set Jesus free , but the Jewish leaders kept shouting , ‘ If you let this man go , you are no friend of Caesar . Anyone who claims to be a king opposes Caesar . ’
43019013	When Pilate heard this , he brought Jesus out and sat down on the judge’s seat at a place known as the Stone Pavement ( which in Aramaic is Gabbatha ) .
43019014	It was the day of Preparation of the Passover ; it was about noon . ‘ Here is your king , ’ Pilate said to the Jews .
43019015	But they shouted , ‘ Take him away ! Take him away ! Crucify him ! ’ ‘ Shall I crucify your king ? ’ Pilate asked . ‘ We have no king but Caesar , ’ the chief priests answered .
43019016	Finally Pilate handed him over to them to be crucified . So the soldiers took charge of Jesus .
43019017	Carrying his own cross , he went out to the place of the Skull ( which in Aramaic is called Golgotha ) .
43019018	There they crucified him , and with him two others – one on each side and Jesus in the middle .
43019019	Pilate had a notice prepared and fastened to the cross . It read : jesus of nazareth , the king of the jews .
43019020	Many of the Jews read this sign , for the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city , and the sign was written in Aramaic , Latin and Greek .
43019021	The chief priests of the Jews protested to Pilate , ‘ Do not write “ The King of the Jews ” , but that this man claimed to be king of the Jews . ’
43019022	Pilate answered , ‘ What I have written , I have written . ’
43019023	When the soldiers crucified Jesus , they took his clothes , dividing them into four shares , one for each of them , with the undergarment remaining . This garment was seamless , woven in one piece from top to bottom .
43019024	‘ Let’s not tear it , ’ they said to one another . ‘ Let’s decide by lot who will get it . ’ This happened that the scripture might be fulfilled that said , ‘ They divided my clothes among them and cast lots for my garment . ’
43019025	Near the cross of Jesus stood his mother , his mother’s sister , Mary the wife of Clopas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	When Jesus saw his mother there , and the disciple whom he loved standing near by , he said to her , ‘ Woman , here is your son , ’
43019027	and to the disciple , ‘ Here is your mother . ’ From that time on , this disciple took her into his home .
43019028	Later , knowing that everything had now been finished , and so that Scripture would be fulfilled , Jesus said , ‘ I am thirsty . ’
43019029	A jar of wine vinegar was there , so they soaked a sponge in it , put the sponge on a stalk of the hyssop plant , and lifted it to Jesus’ lips .
43019030	When he had received the drink , Jesus said , ‘ It is finished . ’ With that , he bowed his head and gave up his spirit .
43019031	Now it was the day of Preparation , and the next day was to be a special Sabbath . Because the Jewish leaders did not want the bodies left on the crosses during the Sabbath , they asked Pilate to have the legs broken and the bodies taken down .
43019032	The soldiers therefore came and broke the legs of the first man who had been crucified with Jesus , and then those of the other .
43019033	But when they came to Jesus and found that he was already dead , they did not break his legs .
43019034	Instead , one of the soldiers pierced Jesus’ side with a spear , bringing a sudden flow of blood and water .
43019035	The man who saw it has given testimony , and his testimony is true . He knows that he tells the truth , and he testifies so that you also may believe .
43019036	These things happened so that the scripture would be fulfilled : ‘ Not one of his bones will be broken , ’
43019037	and , as another scripture says , ‘ They will look on the one they have pierced . ’
43019038	Later , Joseph of Arimathea asked Pilate for the body of Jesus . Now Joseph was a disciple of Jesus , but secretly because he feared the Jewish leaders . With Pilate’s permission , he came and took the body away .
43019039	He was accompanied by Nicodemus , the man who earlier had visited Jesus at night . Nicodemus brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about thirty-five kilograms .
43019040	Taking Jesus’ body , the two of them wrapped it , with the spices , in strips of linen . This was in accordance with Jewish burial customs .
43019041	At the place where Jesus was crucified , there was a garden , and in the garden a new tomb , in which no one had ever been laid .
43019042	Because it was the Jewish day of Preparation and since the tomb was near by , they laid Jesus there .
43020001	Early on the first day of the week , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene went to the tomb and saw that the stone had been removed from the entrance .
43020002	So she came running to Simon Peter and the other disciple , the one Jesus loved , and said , ‘ They have taken the Lord out of the tomb , and we don’t know where they have put him ! ’
43020003	So Peter and the other disciple started for the tomb .
43020004	Both were running , but the other disciple outran Peter and reached the tomb first .
43020005	He bent over and looked in at the strips of linen lying there but did not go in .
43020006	Then Simon Peter came along behind him and went straight into the tomb . He saw the strips of linen lying there ,
43020007	as well as the cloth that had been wrapped round Jesus’ head . The cloth was still lying in its place , separate from the linen .
43020008	Finally the other disciple , who had reached the tomb first , also went inside . He saw and believed .
43020009	( They still did not understand from Scripture that Jesus had to rise from the dead . )
43020010	Then the disciples went back to where they were staying .
43020011	Now Mary stood outside the tomb crying . As she wept , she bent over to look into the tomb
43020012	and saw two angels in white , seated where Jesus’ body had been , one at the head and the other at the foot .
43020013	They asked her , ‘ Woman , why are you crying ? ’ ‘ They have taken my Lord away , ’ she said , ‘ and I don’t know where they have put him . ’
43020014	At this , she turned round and saw Jesus standing there , but she did not realise that it was Jesus .
43020015	He asked her , ‘ Woman , why are you crying ? Who is it you are looking for ? ’ Thinking he was the gardener , she said , ‘ Sir , if you have carried him away , tell me where you have put him , and I will get him . ’
43020016	Jesus said to her , ‘ Mary . ’ She turned towards him and cried out in Aramaic , ‘ Rabboni ! ’ ( which means ‘ Teacher ’ ) .
43020017	Jesus said , ‘ Do not hold on to me , for I have not yet ascended to the Father . Go instead to my brothers and tell them , “ I am ascending to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God . ” ’
43020018	Mary Magdalene went to the disciples with the news : ‘ I have seen the Lord ! ’ And she told them that he had said these things to her .
43020019	On the evening of that first day of the week , when the disciples were together , with the doors locked for fear of the Jewish leaders , Jesus came and stood among them and said , ‘ Peace be with you ! ’
43020020	After he said this , he showed them his hands and side . The disciples were overjoyed when they saw the Lord .
43020021	Again Jesus said , ‘ Peace be with you ! As the Father has sent me , I am sending you . ’
43020022	And with that he breathed on them and said , ‘ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive anyone’s sins , their sins are forgiven ; if you do not forgive them , they are not forgiven . ’
43020024	Now Thomas ( also known as Didymus ) , one of the Twelve , was not with the disciples when Jesus came .
43020025	So the other disciples told him , ‘ We have seen the Lord ! ’ But he said to them , ‘ Unless I see the nail marks in his hands and put my finger where the nails were , and put my hand into his side , I will not believe . ’
43020026	A week later his disciples were in the house again , and Thomas was with them . Though the doors were locked , Jesus came and stood among them and said , ‘ Peace be with you ! ’
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , ‘ Put your finger here ; see my hands . Reach out your hand and put it into my side . Stop doubting and believe . ’
43020028	Thomas said to him , ‘ My Lord and my God ! ’
43020029	Then Jesus told him , ‘ Because you have seen me , you have believed ; blessed are those who have not seen and yet have believed . ’
43020030	Jesus performed many other signs in the presence of his disciples , which are not recorded in this book .
43020031	But these are written that you may believe that Jesus is the Messiah , the Son of God , and that by believing you may have life in his name .
43021001	Afterwards Jesus appeared again to his disciples , by the Sea of Galilee . It happened this way :
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( also known as Didymus ) , Nathanael from Cana in Galilee , the sons of Zebedee , and two other disciples were together .
43021003	‘ I’m going out to fish , ’ Simon Peter told them , and they said , ‘ We’ll go with you . ’ So they went out and got into the boat , but that night they caught nothing .
43021004	Early in the morning , Jesus stood on the shore , but the disciples did not realise that it was Jesus .
43021005	He called out to them , ‘ Friends , haven’t you any fish ? ’ ‘ No , ’ they answered .
43021006	He said , ‘ Throw your net on the right side of the boat and you will find some . ’ When they did , they were unable to haul the net in because of the large number of fish .
43021007	Then the disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter , ‘ It is the Lord ! ’ As soon as Simon Peter heard him say , ‘ It is the Lord , ’ he wrapped his outer garment round him ( for he had taken it off ) and jumped into the water .
43021008	The other disciples followed in the boat , towing the net full of fish , for they were not far from shore , about a hundred metres .
43021009	When they landed , they saw a fire of burning coals there with fish on it , and some bread .
43021010	Jesus said to them , ‘ Bring some of the fish you have just caught . ’
43021011	So Simon Peter climbed back into the boat and dragged the net ashore . It was full of large fish , 153 , but even with so many the net was not torn .
43021012	Jesus said to them , ‘ Come and have breakfast . ’ None of the disciples dared ask him , ‘ Who are you ? ’ They knew it was the Lord .
43021013	Jesus came , took the bread and gave it to them , and did the same with the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time Jesus appeared to his disciples after he was raised from the dead .
43021015	When they had finished eating , Jesus said to Simon Peter , ‘ Simon son of John , do you love me more than these ? ’ ‘ Yes , Lord , ’ he said , ‘ you know that I love you . ’ Jesus said , ‘ Feed my lambs . ’
43021016	Again Jesus said , ‘ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ’ He answered , ‘ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ’ Jesus said , ‘ Take care of my sheep . ’
43021017	The third time he said to him , ‘ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ’ Peter was hurt because Jesus asked him the third time , ‘ Do you love me ? ’ He said , ‘ Lord , you know all things ; you know that I love you . ’ Jesus said , ‘ Feed my sheep .
43021018	Very truly I tell you , when you were younger you dressed yourself and went where you wanted ; but when you are old you will stretch out your hands , and someone else will dress you and lead you where you do not want to go . ’
43021019	Jesus said this to indicate the kind of death by which Peter would glorify God . Then he said to him , ‘ Follow me ! ’
43021020	Peter turned and saw that the disciple whom Jesus loved was following them . ( This was the one who had leaned back against Jesus at the supper and had said , ‘ Lord , who is going to betray you ? ’ )
43021021	When Peter saw him , he asked , ‘ Lord , what about him ? ’
43021022	Jesus answered , ‘ If I want him to remain alive until I return , what is that to you ? You must follow me . ’
43021023	Because of this , the rumour spread among the believers that this disciple would not die . But Jesus did not say that he would not die ; he only said , ‘ If I want him to remain alive until I return , what is that to you ? ’
43021024	This is the disciple who testifies to these things and who wrote them down . We know that his testimony is true .
43021025	Jesus did many other things as well . If every one of them were written down , I suppose that even the whole world would not have room for the books that would be written .
44001001	In my former book , Theophilus , I wrote about all that Jesus began to do and to teach
44001002	until the day he was taken up to heaven , after giving instructions through the Holy Spirit to the apostles he had chosen .
44001003	After his suffering , he presented himself to them and gave many convincing proofs that he was alive . He appeared to them over a period of forty days and spoke about the kingdom of God .
44001004	On one occasion , while he was eating with them , he gave them this command : ‘ Do not leave Jerusalem , but wait for the gift my Father promised , which you have heard me speak about .
44001005	For John baptised with water , but in a few days you will be baptised with the Holy Spirit . ’
44001006	Then they gathered round him and asked him , ‘ Lord , are you at this time going to restore the kingdom to Israel ? ’
44001007	He said to them : ‘ It is not for you to know the times or dates the Father has set by his own authority .
44001008	But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you ; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem , and in all Judea and Samaria , and to the ends of the earth . ’
44001009	After he said this , he was taken up before their very eyes , and a cloud hid him from their sight .
44001010	They were looking intently up into the sky as he was going , when suddenly two men dressed in white stood beside them .
44001011	‘ Men of Galilee , ’ they said , ‘ why do you stand here looking into the sky ? This same Jesus , who has been taken from you into heaven , will come back in the same way you have seen him go into heaven . ’
44001012	Then the apostles returned to Jerusalem from the hill called the Mount of Olives , a Sabbath day’s walk from the city .
44001013	When they arrived , they went upstairs to the room where they were staying . Those present were Peter , John , James and Andrew ; Philip and Thomas , Bartholomew and Matthew ; James son of Alphaeus and Simon the Zealot , and Judas son of James .
44001014	They all joined together constantly in prayer , along with the women and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brothers .
44001015	In those days Peter stood up among the believers ( a group numbering about a hundred and twenty )
44001016	and said , ‘ Brothers and sisters , the Scripture had to be fulfilled in which the Holy Spirit spoke long ago through David concerning Judas , who served as guide for those who arrested Jesus .
44001017	He was one of our number and shared in our ministry . ’
44001018	( With the payment he received for his wickedness , Judas bought a field ; there he fell headlong , his body burst open and all his intestines spilled out .
44001019	Everyone in Jerusalem heard about this , so they called that field in their language Akeldama , that is , Field of Blood . )
44001020	‘ For , ’ said Peter , ‘ it is written in the Book of Psalms : ‘ “ May his place be deserted ; let there be no one to dwell in it , ” ‘ “ May another take his place of leadership . ”
44001023	So they nominated two men : Joseph called Barsabbas ( also known as Justus ) and Matthias .
44001024	Then they prayed , ‘ Lord , you know everyone’s heart . Show us which of these two you have chosen
44001025	to take over this apostolic ministry , which Judas left to go where he belongs . ’
44001026	Then they cast lots , and the lot fell to Matthias ; so he was added to the eleven apostles .
44002001	When the day of Pentecost came , they were all together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly a sound like the blowing of a violent wind came from heaven and filled the whole house where they were sitting .
44002003	They saw what seemed to be tongues of fire that separated and came to rest on each of them .
44002004	All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues as the Spirit enabled them .
44002005	Now there were staying in Jerusalem God-fearing Jews from every nation under heaven .
44002006	When they heard this sound , a crowd came together in bewilderment , because each one heard their own language being spoken .
44002007	Utterly amazed , they asked : ‘ Aren’t all these who are speaking Galileans ?
44002008	Then how is it that each of us hears them in our native language ?
44002009	Parthians , Medes and Elamites ; residents of Mesopotamia , Judea and Cappadocia , Pontus and Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia and Pamphylia , Egypt and the parts of Libya near Cyrene ; visitors from Rome
44002011	( both Jews and converts to Judaism ) ; Cretans and Arabs – we hear them declaring the wonders of God in our own tongues ! ’
44002012	Amazed and perplexed , they asked one another , ‘ What does this mean ? ’
44002013	Some , however , made fun of them and said , ‘ They have had too much wine . ’
44002014	Then Peter stood up with the Eleven , raised his voice and addressed the crowd : ‘ Fellow Jews and all of you who live in Jerusalem , let me explain this to you ; listen carefully to what I say .
44002015	These people are not drunk , as you suppose . It’s only nine in the morning !
44002016	No , this is what was spoken by the prophet Joel :
44002017	‘ “ In the last days , God says , I will pour out my Spirit on all people . Your sons and daughters will prophesy , your young men will see visions , your old men will dream dreams .
44002018	Even on my servants , both men and women , I will pour out my Spirit in those days , and they will prophesy .
44002019	I will show wonders in the heavens above and signs on the earth below , blood and fire and billows of smoke .
44002020	The sun will be turned to darkness and the moon to blood before the coming of the great and glorious day of the Lord .
44002021	And everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved . ”
44002022	‘ Fellow Israelites , listen to this : Jesus of Nazareth was a man accredited by God to you by miracles , wonders and signs , which God did among you through him , as you yourselves know .
44002023	This man was handed over to you by God’s deliberate plan and foreknowledge ; and you , with the help of wicked men , put him to death by nailing him to the cross .
44002024	But God raised him from the dead , freeing him from the agony of death , because it was impossible for death to keep its hold on him .
44002025	David said about him : ‘ “ I saw the Lord always before me . Because he is at my right hand , I will not be shaken .
44002026	Therefore my heart is glad and my tongue rejoices ; my body also will rest in hope ,
44002027	because you will not abandon me to the realm of the dead , you will not let your holy one see decay .
44002028	You have made known to me the paths of life ; you will fill me with joy in your presence . ”
44002029	‘ Fellow Israelites , I can tell you confidently that the patriarch David died and was buried , and his tomb is here to this day .
44002030	But he was a prophet and knew that God had promised him on oath that he would place one of his descendants on his throne .
44002031	Seeing what was to come , he spoke of the resurrection of the Messiah , that he was not abandoned to the realm of the dead , nor did his body see decay .
44002032	God has raised this Jesus to life , and we are all witnesses of it .
44002033	Exalted to the right hand of God , he has received from the Father the promised Holy Spirit and has poured out what you now see and hear .
44002034	For David did not ascend to heaven , and yet he said , ‘ “ The Lord said to my Lord : ‘ Sit at my right hand
44002035	until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet . ’ ”
44002036	‘ Therefore let all Israel be assured of this : God has made this Jesus , whom you crucified , both Lord and Messiah . ’
44002037	When the people heard this , they were cut to the heart and said to Peter and the other apostles , ‘ Brothers , what shall we do ? ’
44002038	Peter replied , ‘ Repent and be baptised , every one of you , in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins . And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	The promise is for you and your children and for all who are far off – for all whom the Lord our God will call . ’
44002040	With many other words he warned them ; and he pleaded with them , ‘ Save yourselves from this corrupt generation . ’
44002041	Those who accepted his message were baptised , and about three thousand were added to their number that day .
44002042	They devoted themselves to the apostles’ teaching and to fellowship , to the breaking of bread and to prayer .
44002043	Everyone was filled with awe at the many wonders and signs performed by the apostles .
44002044	All the believers were together and had everything in common .
44002045	They sold property and possessions to give to anyone who had need .
44002046	Every day they continued to meet together in the temple courts . They broke bread in their homes and ate together with glad and sincere hearts ,
44002047	praising God and enjoying the favour of all the people . And the Lord added to their number daily those who were being saved .
44003001	One day Peter and John were going up to the temple at the time of prayer – at three in the afternoon .
44003002	Now a man who was lame from birth was being carried to the temple gate called Beautiful , where he was put every day to beg from those going into the temple courts .
44003003	When he saw Peter and John about to enter , he asked them for money .
44003004	Peter looked straight at him , as did John . Then Peter said , ‘ Look at us ! ’
44003005	So the man gave them his attention , expecting to get something from them .
44003006	Then Peter said , ‘ Silver or gold I do not have , but what I do have I give you . In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , walk . ’
44003007	Taking him by the right hand , he helped him up , and instantly the man’s feet and ankles became strong .
44003008	He jumped to his feet and began to walk . Then he went with them into the temple courts , walking and jumping , and praising God .
44003009	When all the people saw him walking and praising God ,
44003010	they recognised him as the same man who used to sit begging at the temple gate called Beautiful , and they were filled with wonder and amazement at what had happened to him .
44003011	While the man held on to Peter and John , all the people were astonished and came running to them in the place called Solomon’s Colonnade .
44003012	When Peter saw this , he said to them : ‘ Fellow Israelites , why does this surprise you ? Why do you stare at us as if by our own power or godliness we had made this man walk ?
44003013	The God of Abraham , Isaac and Jacob , the God of our fathers , has glorified his servant Jesus . You handed him over to be killed , and you disowned him before Pilate , though he had decided to let him go .
44003014	You disowned the Holy and Righteous One and asked that a murderer be released to you .
44003015	You killed the author of life , but God raised him from the dead . We are witnesses of this .
44003016	By faith in the name of Jesus , this man whom you see and know was made strong . It is Jesus’ name and the faith that comes through him that has completely healed him , as you can all see .
44003017	‘ Now , fellow Israelites , I know that you acted in ignorance , as did your leaders .
44003018	But this is how God fulfilled what he had foretold through all the prophets , saying that his Messiah would suffer .
44003019	Repent , then , and turn to God , so that your sins may be wiped out , that times of refreshing may come from the Lord ,
44003020	and that he may send the Messiah , who has been appointed for you – even Jesus .
44003021	Heaven must receive him until the time comes for God to restore everything , as he promised long ago through his holy prophets .
44003022	For Moses said , “ The Lord your God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your own people ; you must listen to everything he tells you .
44003023	Anyone who does not listen to him will be completely cut off from their people . ”
44003024	‘ Indeed , beginning with Samuel , all the prophets who have spoken have foretold these days .
44003025	And you are heirs of the prophets and of the covenant God made with your fathers . He said to Abraham , “ Through your offspring all peoples on earth will be blessed . ”
44003026	When God raised up his servant , he sent him first to you to bless you by turning each of you from your wicked ways . ’
44004001	The priests and the captain of the temple guard and the Sadducees came up to Peter and John while they were speaking to the people .
44004002	They were greatly disturbed because the apostles were teaching the people , proclaiming in Jesus the resurrection of the dead .
44004003	They seized Peter and John and , because it was evening , they put them in jail until the next day .
44004004	But many who heard the message believed ; so the number of men who believed grew to about five thousand .
44004005	The next day the rulers , the elders and the teachers of the law met in Jerusalem .
44004006	Annas the high priest was there , and so were Caiaphas , John , Alexander and others of the high priest’s family .
44004007	They had Peter and John brought before them and began to question them : ‘ By what power or what name did you do this ? ’
44004008	Then Peter , filled with the Holy Spirit , said to them : ‘ Rulers and elders of the people !
44004009	If we are being called to account today for an act of kindness shown to a man who was lame and are being asked how he was healed ,
44004010	then know this , you and all the people of Israel : it is by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom you crucified but whom God raised from the dead , that this man stands before you healed .
44004011	Jesus is ‘ “ the stone you builders rejected , which has become the cornerstone . ”
44004013	When they saw the courage of Peter and John and realised that they were unschooled , ordinary men , they were astonished and they took note that these men had been with Jesus .
44004014	But since they could see the man who had been healed standing there with them , there was nothing they could say .
44004015	So they ordered them to withdraw from the Sanhedrin and then conferred together .
44004016	‘ What are we going to do with these men ? ’ they asked . ‘ Everyone living in Jerusalem knows they have performed a notable sign , and we cannot deny it .
44004017	But to stop this thing from spreading any further among the people , we must warn them to speak no longer to anyone in this name . ’
44004018	Then they called them in again and commanded them not to speak or teach at all in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John replied , ‘ Which is right in God’s eyes : to listen to you , or to him ? You be the judges !
44004020	As for us , we cannot help speaking about what we have seen and heard . ’
44004021	After further threats they let them go . They could not decide how to punish them , because all the people were praising God for what had happened .
44004022	For the man who was miraculously healed was over forty years old .
44004023	On their release , Peter and John went back to their own people and reported all that the chief priests and the elders had said to them .
44004024	When they heard this , they raised their voices together in prayer to God . ‘ Sovereign Lord , ’ they said , ‘ you made the heavens and the earth and the sea , and everything in them .
44004025	You spoke by the Holy Spirit through the mouth of your servant , our father David : ‘ “ Why do the nations rage and the peoples plot in vain ?
44004026	The kings of the earth rise up and the rulers band together against the Lord and against his anointed one . ”
44004031	After they prayed , the place where they were meeting was shaken . And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and spoke the word of God boldly .
44004032	All the believers were one in heart and mind . No one claimed that any of their possessions was their own , but they shared everything they had .
44004033	With great power the apostles continued to testify to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus . And God’s grace was so powerfully at work in them all
44004034	that there was no needy person among them . For from time to time those who owned land or houses sold them , brought the money from the sales
44004035	and put it at the apostles’ feet , and it was distributed to anyone who had need .
44004036	Joseph , a Levite from Cyprus , whom the apostles called Barnabas ( which means ‘ son of encouragement ’ ) ,
44004037	sold a field he owned and brought the money and put it at the apostles’ feet .
44005001	Now a man named Ananias , together with his wife Sapphira , also sold a piece of property .
44005002	With his wife’s full knowledge he kept back part of the money for himself , but brought the rest and put it at the apostles’ feet .
44005003	Then Peter said , ‘ Ananias , how is it that Satan has so filled your heart that you have lied to the Holy Spirit and have kept for yourself some of the money you received for the land ?
44005004	Didn’t it belong to you before it was sold ? And after it was sold , wasn’t the money at your disposal ? What made you think of doing such a thing ? You have not lied just to human beings but to God . ’
44005005	When Ananias heard this , he fell down and died . And great fear seized all who heard what had happened .
44005006	Then some young men came forward , wrapped up his body , and carried him out and buried him .
44005007	About three hours later his wife came in , not knowing what had happened .
44005008	Peter asked her , ‘ Tell me , is this the price you and Ananias got for the land ? ’ ‘ Yes , ’ she said , ‘ that is the price . ’
44005009	Peter said to her , ‘ How could you conspire to test the Spirit of the Lord ? Listen ! The feet of the men who buried your husband are at the door , and they will carry you out also . ’
44005010	At that moment she fell down at his feet and died . Then the young men came in and , finding her dead , carried her out and buried her beside her husband .
44005011	Great fear seized the whole church and all who heard about these events .
44005012	The apostles performed many signs and wonders among the people . And all the believers used to meet together in Solomon’s Colonnade .
44005013	No one else dared join them , even though they were highly regarded by the people .
44005014	Nevertheless , more and more men and women believed in the Lord and were added to their number .
44005015	As a result , people brought those who were ill into the streets and laid them on beds and mats so that at least Peter’s shadow might fall on some of them as he passed by .
44005016	Crowds gathered also from the towns around Jerusalem , bringing those who were ill and those tormented by impure spirits , and all of them were healed .
44005017	Then the high priest and all his associates , who were members of the party of the Sadducees , were filled with jealousy .
44005018	They arrested the apostles and put them in the public jail .
44005019	But during the night an angel of the Lord opened the doors of the jail and brought them out .
44005020	‘ Go , stand in the temple courts , ’ he said , ‘ and tell the people all about this new life . ’
44005021	At daybreak they entered the temple courts , as they had been told , and began to teach the people . When the high priest and his associates arrived , they called together the Sanhedrin – the full assembly of the elders of Israel – and sent to the jail for the apostles .
44005022	But on arriving at the jail , the officers did not find them there . So they went back and reported ,
44005023	‘ We found the jail securely locked , with the guards standing at the doors ; but when we opened them , we found no one inside . ’
44005024	On hearing this report , the captain of the temple guard and the chief priests were at a loss , wondering what this might lead to .
44005025	Then someone came and said , ‘ Look ! The men you put in jail are standing in the temple courts teaching the people . ’
44005026	At that , the captain went with his officers and brought the apostles . They did not use force , because they feared that the people would stone them .
44005027	The apostles were brought in and made to appear before the Sanhedrin to be questioned by the high priest .
44005028	‘ We gave you strict orders not to teach in this name , ’ he said . ‘ Yet you have filled Jerusalem with your teaching and are determined to make us guilty of this man’s blood . ’
44005029	Peter and the other apostles replied : ‘ We must obey God rather than human beings !
44005030	The God of our ancestors raised Jesus from the dead – whom you killed by hanging him on a cross .
44005031	God exalted him to his own right hand as Prince and Saviour that he might bring Israel to repentance and forgive their sins .
44005032	We are witnesses of these things , and so is the Holy Spirit , whom God has given to those who obey him . ’
44005033	When they heard this , they were furious and wanted to put them to death .
44005034	But a Pharisee named Gamaliel , a teacher of the law , who was honoured by all the people , stood up in the Sanhedrin and ordered that the men be put outside for a little while .
44005035	Then he addressed the Sanhedrin : ‘ Men of Israel , consider carefully what you intend to do to these men .
44005036	Some time ago Theudas appeared , claiming to be somebody , and about four hundred men rallied to him . He was killed , all his followers were dispersed , and it all came to nothing .
44005037	After him , Judas the Galilean appeared in the days of the census and led a band of people in revolt . He too was killed , and all his followers were scattered .
44005038	Therefore , in the present case I advise you : leave these men alone ! Let them go ! For if their purpose or activity is of human origin , it will fail .
44005039	But if it is from God , you will not be able to stop these men ; you will only find yourselves fighting against God . ’
44005040	His speech persuaded them . They called the apostles in and had them flogged . Then they ordered them not to speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
44005041	The apostles left the Sanhedrin , rejoicing because they had been counted worthy of suffering disgrace for the Name .
44005042	Day after day , in the temple courts and from house to house , they never stopped teaching and proclaiming the good news that Jesus is the Messiah .
44006001	In those days when the number of disciples was increasing , the Hellenistic Jews among them complained against the Hebraic Jews because their widows were being overlooked in the daily distribution of food .
44006002	So the Twelve gathered all the disciples together and said , ‘ It would not be right for us to neglect the ministry of the word of God in order to wait on tables .
44006003	Brothers and sisters , choose seven men from among you who are known to be full of the Spirit and wisdom . We will turn this responsibility over to them
44006004	and will give our attention to prayer and the ministry of the word . ’
44006005	This proposal pleased the whole group . They chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Spirit ; also Philip , Procorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolas from Antioch , a convert to Judaism .
44006006	They presented these men to the apostles , who prayed and laid their hands on them .
44006007	So the word of God spread . The number of disciples in Jerusalem increased rapidly , and a large number of priests became obedient to the faith .
44006008	Now Stephen , a man full of God’s grace and power , performed great wonders and signs among the people .
44006009	Opposition arose , however , from members of the Synagogue of the Freedmen ( as it was called ) – Jews of Cyrene and Alexandria as well as the provinces of Cilicia and Asia – who began to argue with Stephen .
44006010	But they could not stand up against the wisdom the Spirit gave him as he spoke .
44006011	Then they secretly persuaded some men to say , ‘ We have heard Stephen speak blasphemous words against Moses and against God . ’
44006012	So they stirred up the people and the elders and the teachers of the law . They seized Stephen and brought him before the Sanhedrin .
44006013	They produced false witnesses , who testified , ‘ This fellow never stops speaking against this holy place and against the law .
44006014	For we have heard him say that this Jesus of Nazareth will destroy this place and change the customs Moses handed down to us . ’
44006015	All who were sitting in the Sanhedrin looked intently at Stephen , and they saw that his face was like the face of an angel .
44007001	Then the high priest asked Stephen , ‘ Are these charges true ? ’
44007002	To this he replied : ‘ Brothers and fathers , listen to me ! The God of glory appeared to our father Abraham while he was still in Mesopotamia , before he lived in Harran .
44007003	“ Leave your country and your people , ” God said , “ and go to the land I will show you . ”
44007004	‘ So he left the land of the Chaldeans and settled in Harran . After the death of his father , God sent him to this land where you are now living .
44007005	He gave him no inheritance here , not even enough ground to set his foot on . But God promised him that he and his descendants after him would possess the land , even though at that time Abraham had no child .
44007006	God spoke to him in this way : “ For four hundred years your descendants will be strangers in a country not their own , and they will be enslaved and ill-treated .
44007007	But I will punish the nation they serve as slaves , ” God said , “ and afterwards they will come out of that country and worship me in this place . ”
44007008	Then he gave Abraham the covenant of circumcision . And Abraham became the father of Isaac and circumcised him eight days after his birth . Later Isaac became the father of Jacob , and Jacob became the father of the twelve patriarchs .
44007009	‘ Because the patriarchs were jealous of Joseph , they sold him as a slave into Egypt . But God was with him
44007010	and rescued him from all his troubles . He gave Joseph wisdom and enabled him to gain the goodwill of Pharaoh king of Egypt . So Pharaoh made him ruler over Egypt and all his palace .
44007011	‘ Then a famine struck all Egypt and Canaan , bringing great suffering , and our ancestors could not find food .
44007012	When Jacob heard that there was grain in Egypt , he sent our forefathers on their first visit .
44007013	On their second visit , Joseph told his brothers who he was , and Pharaoh learned about Joseph’s family .
44007014	After this , Joseph sent for his father Jacob and his whole family , seventy-five in all .
44007015	Then Jacob went down to Egypt , where he and our ancestors died .
44007016	Their bodies were brought back to Shechem and placed in the tomb that Abraham had bought from the sons of Hamor at Shechem for a certain sum of money .
44007017	‘ As the time drew near for God to fulfil his promise to Abraham , the number of our people in Egypt had greatly increased .
44007018	Then “ a new king , to whom Joseph meant nothing , came to power in Egypt ” .
44007019	He dealt treacherously with our people and oppressed our ancestors by forcing them to throw out their newborn babies so that they would die .
44007020	‘ At that time Moses was born , and he was no ordinary child . For three months he was cared for by his family .
44007021	When he was placed outside , Pharaoh’s daughter took him and brought him up as her own son .
44007022	Moses was educated in all the wisdom of the Egyptians and was powerful in speech and action .
44007023	‘ When Moses was forty years old , he decided to visit his own people , the Israelites .
44007024	He saw one of them being ill-treated by an Egyptian , so he went to his defence and avenged him by killing the Egyptian .
44007025	Moses thought that his own people would realise that God was using him to rescue them , but they did not .
44007026	The next day Moses came upon two Israelites who were fighting . He tried to reconcile them by saying , “ Men , you are brothers ; why do you want to hurt each other ? ”
44007027	‘ But the man who was ill-treating the other pushed Moses aside and said , “ Who made you ruler and judge over us ?
44007028	Are you thinking of killing me as you killed the Egyptian yesterday ? ”
44007029	When Moses heard this , he fled to Midian , where he settled as a foreigner and had two sons .
44007030	‘ After forty years had passed , an angel appeared to Moses in the flames of a burning bush in the desert near Mount Sinai .
44007031	When he saw this , he was amazed at the sight . As he went over to get a closer look , he heard the Lord say :
44007032	“ I am the God of your fathers , the God of Abraham , Isaac and Jacob . ” Moses trembled with fear and did not dare to look .
44007033	‘ Then the Lord said to him , “ Take off your sandals , for the place where you are standing is holy ground .
44007034	I have indeed seen the oppression of my people in Egypt . I have heard their groaning and have come down to set them free . Now come , I will send you back to Egypt . ”
44007035	‘ This is the same Moses they had rejected with the words , “ Who made you ruler and judge ? ” He was sent to be their ruler and deliverer by God himself , through the angel who appeared to him in the bush .
44007036	He led them out of Egypt and performed wonders and signs in Egypt , at the Red Sea and for forty years in the wilderness .
44007037	‘ This is the Moses who told the Israelites , “ God will raise up for you a prophet like me from your own people . ”
44007038	He was in the assembly in the wilderness , with the angel who spoke to him on Mount Sinai , and with our ancestors ; and he received living words to pass on to us .
44007039	‘ But our ancestors refused to obey him . Instead , they rejected him and in their hearts turned back to Egypt .
44007040	They told Aaron , “ Make us gods who will go before us . As for this fellow Moses who led us out of Egypt – we don’t know what has happened to him ! ”
44007041	That was the time they made an idol in the form of a calf . They brought sacrifices to it and revelled in what their own hands had made .
44007042	But God turned away from them and gave them over to the worship of the sun , moon and stars . This agrees with what is written in the book of the prophets : ‘ “ Did you bring me sacrifices and offerings for forty years in the wilderness , people of Israel ?
44007043	You have taken up the tabernacle of Molek and the star of your god Rephan , the idols you made to worship . Therefore I will send you into exile ” beyond Babylon .
44007044	‘ Our ancestors had the tabernacle of the covenant law with them in the wilderness . It had been made as God directed Moses , according to the pattern he had seen .
44007045	After receiving the tabernacle , our ancestors under Joshua brought it with them when they took the land from the nations God drove out before them . It remained in the land until the time of David ,
44007046	who enjoyed God’s favour and asked that he might provide a dwelling-place for the God of Jacob .
44007047	But it was Solomon who built a house for him .
44007048	‘ However , the Most High does not live in houses made by human hands . As the prophet says :
44007049	‘ “ Heaven is my throne , and the earth is my footstool . What kind of house will you build for me ? Or where will my resting place be ?
44007050	Has not my hand made all these things ? ”
44007051	‘ You stiff-necked people ! Your hearts and ears are still uncircumcised . You are just like your ancestors : you always resist the Holy Spirit !
44007052	Was there ever a prophet your ancestors did not persecute ? They even killed those who predicted the coming of the Righteous One . And now you have betrayed and murdered him –
44007053	you who have received the law that was given through angels but have not obeyed it . ’
44007054	When the members of the Sanhedrin heard this , they were furious and gnashed their teeth at him .
44007055	But Stephen , full of the Holy Spirit , looked up to heaven and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing at the right hand of God .
44007056	‘ Look , ’ he said , ‘ I see heaven open and the Son of Man standing at the right hand of God . ’
44007057	At this they covered their ears and , yelling at the top of their voices , they all rushed at him ,
44007058	dragged him out of the city and began to stone him . Meanwhile , the witnesses laid their coats at the feet of a young man named Saul .
44007059	While they were stoning him , Stephen prayed , ‘ Lord Jesus , receive my spirit . ’
44007060	Then he fell on his knees and cried out , ‘ Lord , do not hold this sin against them . ’ When he had said this , he fell asleep .
44008001	And Saul approved of their killing him . On that day a great persecution broke out against the church in Jerusalem , and all except the apostles were scattered throughout Judea and Samaria .
44008002	Godly men buried Stephen and mourned deeply for him .
44008003	But Saul began to destroy the church . Going from house to house , he dragged off both men and women and put them in prison .
44008004	Those who had been scattered preached the word wherever they went .
44008005	Philip went down to a city in Samaria and proclaimed the Messiah there .
44008006	When the crowds heard Philip and saw the signs he performed , they all paid close attention to what he said .
44008007	For with shrieks , impure spirits came out of many , and many who were paralysed or lame were healed .
44008008	So there was great joy in that city .
44008009	Now for some time a man named Simon had practised sorcery in the city and amazed all the people of Samaria . He boasted that he was someone great ,
44008010	and all the people , both high and low , gave him their attention and exclaimed , ‘ This man is rightly called the Great Power of God . ’
44008011	They followed him because he had amazed them for a long time with his sorcery .
44008012	But when they believed Philip as he proclaimed the good news of the kingdom of God and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptised , both men and women .
44008013	Simon himself believed and was baptised . And he followed Philip everywhere , astonished by the great signs and miracles he saw .
44008014	When the apostles in Jerusalem heard that Samaria had accepted the word of God , they sent Peter and John to Samaria .
44008015	When they arrived , they prayed for the new believers there that they might receive the Holy Spirit ,
44008016	because the Holy Spirit had not yet come on any of them ; they had simply been baptised in the name of the Lord Jesus .
44008017	Then Peter and John placed their hands on them , and they received the Holy Spirit .
44008018	When Simon saw that the Spirit was given at the laying on of the apostles’ hands , he offered them money
